Decks.Name: Civic
Decks.Description: This deck represents a wide range of diverse stakeholders in any given neighborhood.
Questions: How might we improve public safety for women and girls?
How might we make our public spaces and programming more accessible to senior citizens?
How might we better engage young people to contribute to the neighborhood?
